tasks.question: Your company has a regional Compute Engine software as a service (SaaS) application that currently allows traffic from the entire internet. The application should not be accessible from the public internet. You also want to allow only certain virtual machines (VMs) to access your application by using Secure Shell (SSH). What should you do to satisfy the requirements?
